title: Australian diary. No. 003 (A)
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: a look at a Brisbane creche; Spanish monks and nuns teach Aboriginal children at New Norcia, a mission in Western Australia; families shown mining mica at Harts Range in the Northern terrotory and a Victorian fashion parade as models exhibit the latest styles in woollen clothing.
